fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cloud a players mind once per game, preventing them from receiving feedback.
- (Day Ability: {1} Use) Call upon the Full Moon to make a blinding fog once per game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone who was killed in the fog will have their roles shown as (Unknown) and will have their wills cleaned.
- Cause of death in the fog will be hidden.
- Calling fog from a blood moon will cause the next days discussion phase to be skipped.
- The Umbrae will see the cause of death, roles, and wills of those undiscernable by the fog.
- Detection Immunity during non-moon nights, unless you are disguised.
- Conversion Immunity
